control.description: Ronie's dirty hack for showing fanart slideshow instead of visualisation :)
Ronie's dirty hack for showing fanart slideshow instead of visualisation :)

control.visible: Control.HasFocus(12) | Control.HasFocus(11) | Control.HasFocus(8003) | Control.HasFocus(8000) | Control.HasFocus(8002) | Control.HasFocus(8001) | Control.HasFocus(8004) | Control.HasFocus(8005) | Control.HasFocus(8006)

include.condition: Skin.HasSetting(Small Film Strip) + Skin.HasSetting(Low Film Strip)
Skin.HasSetting(Small Film Strip) + Skin.HasSetting(Low Film Strip)
